job_description:
Are you interested in joining a fast-paced team and making a difference from the very first day of work? Come join our team! At NVIDIA, we are tackling challenges no one else can solve. Our work in AI and industrial digital twins is redefining the world’s largest industries and profoundly impacting society. Our vision in NVIDIA Marketing is to lead and champion the AI revolution. We are tasked to show the world that NVIDIA is the AI computing company, to make AI relevant to the business enterprise, and to communicate how it will transform lives and change the world. The NVIDIA Enterprise Partner Marketing team is looking for a dynamic professional who can help us champion AI through our partners in strategic industries. In this role as an Enterprise Industry Partner Marketing Manager, you will help drive the growth of NVIDIA’s top industries through partner marketing activities. This team member will own the partner marketing strategy for their assigned vertical, working with all partner types in North America.

What You Will Be Doing

Wondering what this role entails? Here’s what you’ll be doing in a nutshell
• Leading and developing co-marketing strategies and co-marketing plans, together with NVIDIA partner account teams and strategic partners that generate awareness, thought leadership, and demand.
• Driving partner marketing initiatives within your assigned industry that support the industries sales goals & objectives.
• Supervising marketing execution to ensure messaging and branding are on point and aligned to the strategy.
• Reviewing return on investment metrics and providing feedback to partners and internal customers to continue to build increasingly effective campaigns.
• Building trusted and valued relationships with your partners and internal stakeholders.

What We Need To See
• 8+ years of work-related experience in high-tech, partner marketing, channel marketing, or field marketing.
• Experience in industry specific marketing or partner support is a requirement.
• Strong marketing proficiency and validated experience in marketing strategy, demand generation, partner management, and marketing communications.
• Strong written and oral communication skills with the ability to successfully collaborate with all levels of management within NVIDIA and partner organizations.
• BS/BA in Business or Marketing or equivalent experience.
• Experience in driving projects across cross functional teams within an organization.
• Ability to lead and balance multiple projects at a time in a multifaceted environment.
• Capable of working autonomously with little supervision.

Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd
• Proven track record for building successful industry campaigns within the partner ecosystem with examples.
• A self-starter with a positive attitude.

NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. We have some of the most forward-thinking and hardworking people in the world working for us. If you are creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you!

The base salary range is 132,000 USD – 218,500 USD. Your base salary will be determined based on your location, experience, and the pay of employees in similar positions.

You will also be eligible for equity and benefits . NVIDIA accepts applications on an ongoing basis.

NVIDIA is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and proud to be an equal opportunity employer. As we highly value diversity in our current and future employees, we do not discriminate (including in our hiring and promotion practices) on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by law.

Qualifications: 8+ years of work-related experience in high-tech, partner marketing, channel marketing, or field marketing
Experience in industry specific marketing or partner support is a requirement
Strong marketing proficiency and validated experience in marketing strategy, demand generation, partner management, and marketing communications
Strong written and oral communication skills with the ability to successfully collaborate with all levels of management within NVIDIA and partner organizations
BS/BA in Business or Marketing or equivalent experience
Experience in driving projects across cross functional teams within an organization
Ability to lead and balance multiple projects at a time in a multifaceted environment
Capable of working autonomously with little supervision
Proven track record for building successful industry campaigns within the partner ecosystem with examples
A self-starter with a positive attitude
Responsibilities: In this role as an Enterprise Industry Partner Marketing Manager, you will help drive the growth of NVIDIA’s top industries through partner marketing activities
This team member will own the partner marketing strategy for their assigned vertical, working with all partner types in North America
Leading and developing co-marketing strategies and co-marketing plans, together with NVIDIA partner account teams and strategic partners that generate awareness, thought leadership, and demand
Driving partner marketing initiatives within your assigned industry that support the industries sales goals & objectives
Supervising marketing execution to ensure messaging and branding are on point and aligned to the strategy
Reviewing return on investment metrics and providing feedback to partners and internal customers to continue to build increasingly effective campaigns
Building trusted and valued relationships with your partners and internal stakeholders
Benefits: Your base salary will be determined based on your location, experience, and the pay of employees in similar positions
You will also be eligible for equity and benefits
